repoze.depinj Changelog
=======================

0.3 (2011-03-07)
----------------

- Removed inaccurate statement in README.txt.

0.2 (2011-03-07)
----------------

- Allow use of arbitrary (even unhashable) objects as lookup keys for
  dependency injection.


0.1 (2010-02-24)
----------------

- Initial release.
